You can have information from books, but you need to do daily practice of meditation to have a deeper experiences of life. Can you learn horse riding by reading the book? No, you can only have the information. To learn the horse riding you have to get on the horse.

All you need to do is sit upright comfortably in bed or a lounge chair and stop thinking with eyes closed for about one hour or so. This will have your brainwave pattern lower to Alpha and possibly Theta. You will sense the change. Don’t worry you are not losing your mind.
